txt.en: In order to gain more favour with the men of Fushaum Bal north, you decide you will need to destroy tents at Fushaum Bal south.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Note: This quest is only available while the quest, The Fushaum Resolution, is underway.</rgb>
You have destroyed many tents at Fushaum Bal South and for that the leader of Fushaum Bal North is pleased with your efforts.
Destroy tents at Fushaum Bal south ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Fushaum Bal North: Burning the Lawless
Fushaum Bal is located in Talath Ãšrui.\n\nYou should destroy tents in Fushaum Bal south.
Destroyed many tents at Fushaum Bal South.
The encampment of Fushaum Bal is a lawless home to evil men once under the command of Sauron.
